5 April 2012

N.T. Wright: Scripture and the Authority of God

by Aaron Lord

If you’d like to get a taste of what N.T. Wright’s Scripture and the Authority of God is about, the Biologos Foundation has posted a six-part serialized adaptation of a paper by Wright which covers the topics he also addressed in the book. (Biologos has an interest in this subject because of how the matter of literary genre vs. overly-literal biblicism could affect one’s interpretation of Genesis.)
